tarif_description: The Express rate ensures fast and reliable delivery within 3-4 business days. The best solution for urgent parcels and documents.
footer_slogan: Abu Express â€” Your reliable delivery partner in Uzbekistan!
services_air_sea_desc: Abuexpress provides reliable air and sea freight services tailored for customers and businesses. Air delivery with a 7-10 day shipping time is the best option for customers wishing to send parcels to Uzbekistan. Meanwhile, sea freight can take up to 45 days but offers a more cost-effective solution for shipping larger and heavier commercial cargo.

meta.title: ABU Express â€“ International Logistics & Cargo from Turkey, USA, and China to Uzbekistan
meta.description: ABU Express provides international logistics solutions and cargo delivery from Turkey, USA, and China to Uzbekistan. Fast, reliable, and cost-effective!
meta.keywords: Uzbekistan cargo delivery, international logistics, Turkey to Uzbekistan, USA to Uzbekistan, China to Uzbekistan, freight forwarding, cargo shipping, best rates

faq.create_account_answer: Register on the website and confirm your email.
faq.register_order: How to register an online order?
faq.register_order_answer: Select products and proceed to checkout.
faq.tax_free_state: Will there be a warehouse in a tax-free state?
faq.tax_free_state_answer: Yes, there is a warehouse in the tax-free state of Delaware (DE).
